title: Example: Situation Understanding â€“ Event Learning

definitions.Situation Understanding: The process of comprehending the context and details of an event or situation.
definitions.Event Learning: The acquisition of knowledge or skills from an event or situation.

summary: The slide presents an example of situation understanding and event learning, using a protest against vaccines as a case study. It includes a visual of a protest, a question about the event, and a list of terms related to the event with corresponding images.
